title: Ticket #3156: IMPOSSIBLE: status for job
description:
Stuart just reported another occurrence of the "IMPOSSIBLE: status for job" schedd crash at LIGO Caltech.

According to my email archives we have seen this a few times over the years possibly related to tickets s1652, a17748, and Juan's email on 6 June 2012 that ended up sending logs to Greg Thain. 

[root@ldas-pcdev4 ~]# cat /etc/redhat-release
Scientific Linux release 6.1 (Carbon)

[root@ldas-pcdev4 ~]# uname -a
Linux ldas-pcdev4 2.6.32-220.13.1.el6.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Apr 17 15:16:22 CDT 2012 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

[root@ldas-pcdev4 ~]# condor_version
$CondorVersion: 7.8.1 Jun 08 2012 $
$CondorPlatform: x86_64_rhap_6.2 $

This is an automated email from the Condor system
on machine "ldas-pcdev4.ligo.caltech.edu".  Do not reply.

"/usr/sbin/condor_schedd" on "ldas-pcdev4.ligo.caltech.edu" exited with status 4.
Condor will automatically restart this process in 10 seconds.

2012-Oct-03 09:46:19 by gthain:
Would it be possible to get the logs for a recent occurrence? We fixed one cause of IMPOSSIBLE: status for job in 7.7, so I'd like to see if this is a regression, or a different code path.

2012-Oct-09 11:19:47 by gthain:
This is caused by a race condition with NOOP jobs. That is, jobs (usually submitted by DAGman) that set 

noop_job = true

In rare cases, with a heavily loaded schedd, the code that marks these jobs complete (without running them) gets delayed, and another part of the schedd doesn't know about Noop_jobs, and tries to run them, which causes this problem.

Until the code for this lands, setting Requirements = false in these jobs should work around the problem.

2012-Oct-15 14:56:04 by nwp:
CODE REVIEW Looks fine to me.
check_ins:
2012-Oct-09 14:45   Check-in [33625]: Removed 7.8.6 version history item for #3156, as this bug fix has be placed into 7.8.5. (By Karen Miller )
2012-Oct-09 14:37   Check-in [33623]: Rewrite of bug fix version history item that was originally committed for 7.8.6, but now in 7.8.5. ===GT=== #3156 (By Karen Miller )
2012-Oct-09 12:03   Check-in [33616]: Prevent noop job race from asserting the schedd #3156 (By Greg Thain )
2012-Oct-09 11:24   Check-in [33613]: Document #3156 (By Greg Thain )
2012-Oct-09 11:18   Check-in [33611]: Prevent noop job race from asserting the schedd #3156 (By Greg Thain )
